Posts.Content: Got my first PSA results after 10 the surgery it was a 4. Got another one 6 weeks from today. I am concern that it was that high. What should I expect on the next one? Dr. said if still high hormones or radiation treatment. What are your guys experience after prostate surgery.
Posts.Title: Post op- psa

Posts.Content: I have prostate removed nerve sparring surgery January 2014 , viagra does not work, Cialis daily seems to work but my best erection was with Levitra.. What is your guys experience..
Posts.Title: Levitra vs Cialis

Posts.Content: Unfortunately I cannot find the data today, but I did have a spike in the PSA test from 3 to 9 and the biopsy found the 3-4 Gleason level (I am not sure is that is a correct statement). The decision is made I will have the surgery and I will like to Know about how to prepare for it and recover. No Da Vinci , regular .Hopefully nerve saving surgery. Please Advice.
Posts.Title: Having Surgery!!!

Posts.Content: I had surgery to remove my prostrate. After surgery, 5 weeks later PSA test was 4 and six weeks later the test drop to 3.7, Dr. recommended Radiation therapy. Have appointment with radiation oncologist this coming Friday. Will like to know from others that have the same treatment what I should expect and how it affected them and how was the success rate. Pre-Op PSA 9 Gleason 3-4 1st post op PSA 4 2nd post op PSA 3.7 Appreciate the feedback...
Posts.Title: Prescribed Radiation Therapy after Surgery
